turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, could you place a pick up order from Starbucks for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem! Which location did you want to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to go to the closest one to my office, on North Main street in High Point please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have a Starbucks listed at 2209 N Main street, High Point, NC.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is the correct one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a triple expresso venti cafe mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nonfat

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I'm getting the nonfat milk, so I should probably skip the whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else I can add to your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, but please request for it to be made extra hot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have one triple expresso venti cafe mocha with nonfat milk and no whipped cream, extra hot.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What will be your payment method?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you just add it to my account?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, I can add it to the account on file.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order has been placed at Starbucks, 2209 N Main St, and will be available to pick up shortly. A receipt will be sent your your mobile phone for this transaction.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great!
